review_details: Superb day out, great food, great swimming stops, great atmosphere on board, very informative, if you are in zakynthos give this trip a try
Erato in its new position, just gets better and better, nothing is too much trouble, if its not on the menu make up your own meal, ask Elsa for stifado calzone!
This is a must do trip when in zakynthos, very professional and very greek, fish caught, cooked (by the FBI) superb day out
Thomas & Elena have worked so hard and transformed this bar. A must visit location when you are in argassi

We always use Peter for trips and car hire,
He is the most friendly and professional trip adviser. Went on the jeep safari today and cannot recommend it enough
